Text:
Parliamentary

The video is based on the historical development which led to the breakthrough of parliamentarism in 1884. The emphasis is on how the relationship between parliament and the government functions today.

Play time: approx 32 minutes

Produced by Sherpa Film as the Parliamentary education and information service 2003.

-------------------------------------------------- ----------------------

YOUNG ON THINGS

The video follows two of the young newly-elected representatives (2001), showing their meeting with various everyday tasks of the Parliament.

Running Time: 20 minutes

Produced for the Storting's education and information service 2002.
